item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

Monday 5/7/2012's Location will be:

We Have a New Location for this week! (The week after Cinco-de-Mayo)

OAXACA KITCHEN

Oaxaca Kitchen opened up on College Street approximately a year ago, just one building away from Pacifico near the intersection with Crown.  They offer a variety of Mexican Cuisine and a full bar.  I tried the Mexican Mojito and was impressed.

This is our first trip to the Location, so lets give them the NHC welcome and come on out for a drink!

The Manager, Bruce, has generously offered us the following specials:

$4 Imported Draught Beers

$3 Domestic Draught Beers

One of the menu Cocktails will be set to $6.

Bruce will put out a couple plates of appetizers at some point, get there early if you want them!  (Might not last long!)

There will also be an additional Special Cocktail put together that night.

Please RSVP to give the proprietors an accurate estimate of how many people!

For Happy Hour type events, if you are only a "Maybe" please put this in your RSVP Comment.

AJ will host and can be reached at 315-345-9348 Text or call.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: You can try to Call/Text AJ; number below. We're also probably amongst the largest groups at the Bar for a Monday.
item.name: New Location Happy Hour: Oaxaca Kitchen!
